summary: This dispatch contains reports and notes from TERLAUP regarding operational and intelligence matters. It also discusses the preliminary debriefing of THERIAULT, including financial arrangements, the possibility of developing an interest in Krishna Menon, and an invitation to visit the U.S. Additionally, it includes general comments on the Ford Foundation's work in India, Evelyn Hersey's role, and the Delhi Training and Orientation Centre. The dispatch also touches on Communist organization of domestic workers in New Delhi and the State Department's policy on visits to China.
title: Transmittal of Reports
